datafield.subfield: Endothelial cell plasticity in the normal and injured central nervous system /

editors, Esperanza Meléndez Herrera, Profesor e Investigador Titular A, Laboratorio de Eco-fisiología Animal Departamento de Zoología Instituto de Investigaciones Sobre los Recursos Naturales Universidad Michoacana de San Nicolas de Hidalgo (UMSNH) Morelia, Michoacán México; Bryan V. Phillips-Farfán, Investigador en Ciencias Médicas C Laboratorio de Nutrición Experimental Instituto Nacional de Pediatría Coyoacán, D.F. México; Gabriel Gutiérrez Ospina Investigador, Titular B Instituto de Investigaciones Biomédicas Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México (UNAM) Coyoacán, D.F. México.

Early development of the vascular system supplying the brain / Bryan V. Phillips-Farfán, Alma Lilia Fuentes Farías, Gabriel Gutiérrez Ospina, and Esperanza Meléndez Herrera -- Endothelial cell heterogeneity and maintenance of neurogenic niches during development and adult life / Dannia Colín Castelán -- Neuronal-glial-endothelial interactions regulate central nervous system homeostasis / Beatriz Gómez-Gónzalez, Adrian M. Cabañas-Morales, Gabriela Hurtado-Alvarado and Javier Velázquez-Moctezuma -- Dynamic control of neural reproductive centers by endothelial cells / Charlotte Vanacker, Ariane Sharif, and Vincent Prévot -- Alterations of cerebral endothelial cells in drug-resistant epilepsy : drug transporters / Cecilia Zavala-Tecuapetla and Liliana Carmona-Aparicio -- Angiogenesis during tumor proliferation and cell invasion / América Vanoye Carlo, Gisela Gómez Lira, Julieta G. Mendoza Torreblanca, and Oscar A. Pérez González -- Microvascular dysfunction after spinal cord injury / Humberto Mestre and Antonio Ibarra -- Blood vessel remodeling after stroke / Gabriela Moralí and Miguel Cervantes -- Impairment of energy metabolism and vascular function in Alzheimer's disease / Victoria Campos Peña, Bryan V. Phillips Farfán and Karla G. Carvajal Aguilera.
